description: This procurement is subject to the Agreement Between the Inuit of the Nunavut Settlement Area and His Majesty the King in Right of Canada. In accordance with section 9.35.35 Notification of Procurement, this is to provide notification of the subject solicitation. This solicitation is limited for bidding among firms registered on the Inuit Firm Registry (IFR). Public Works & Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites Suppliers to submit a proposal for the Mechanical Work Package \'B\' in the Canadian High Arctic Research Station (CHARS). .,
